// Common Library: Clock Gating cell


module prim_generic_clock_gating (


  input        clk_i,


  input        en_i,


  input        test_en_i,


  output logic clk_o


);




  // Assume en_i synchronized, if not put synchronizer prior to en_i


  logic en_latch;


  always_latch begin


    if (!clk_i) begin


      en_latch = en_i | test_en_i;


    end


  end


  assign clk_o = en_latch & clk_i;




endmodule
